attributes.action: Release a non redacted version of the expenses claims for every minister of parliament forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What on earth do you think we are simpletons? Will you never learn. Secrecy promotes suspicion. Suspicion feeds mistrust. Lack of trust does not get you re-elected.

Understand?

rejection.details: This is a decision for the UK Parliament as whole, not the Prime Minister.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
